Cable / down conductor for Lightning Arrestor
Grid Input Protection Box with Relay Contractor and SPD
Battery trolley box with wheels – Hard Plastic

Inverter Rack with the Following: 1. Electrical Insulation mat (Minimum 0.4 kV)

Signboard for Danger (Electric Shock & High Voltage, No Fire and PASS)
I/P and O/P wiring of Grid Connection-ac cable
Metallic Enclosure with Isolator’s having minimum gap of 1 inch.(PV, Battery & Grid Input to Inverter)
Ceiling fan with regulators – Two modular
Outdoor light with automatic control switch (for dusk to dawn operations)
Outdoor light arm - Rust free (GI Material)
Mob No. of the person installed
Mobile service Provider of RMS device
